DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate azithromycin tear concentration instillation one drop one three T1225 concentration ( 0.5 % , 1 % 1.5 % ) evaluate ocular safety .
DOC.brief_title: Ocular Pharmacokinetics After Single Drop Instillation T1225 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 % 91 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The aim present study compare azithromycin tear ocular concentration single instillation three different T1225 concentration order determine early azithromycin tear concentration ass T1225 concentration , allow high azithromycin tear concentration , 24 hour single instillation .
DOC.criteria: Male/female age 18 45 year ; Written inform consent ; Healthy volunteer without subjective ocular symptom ; Corrected visual acuity > = 6/10 ; Registered national register healthy volunteer Ocular trauma , infection inflammation within last 3 month ; Conjunctival hyperaemia ( score > = 2 ) ; Folliculopapillary conjunctivitis ( score > = 2 ) ; Topical ocular treatment within last month ; Ocular surgery , include LASIK PRK , within last 12 month ; Other ocular laser within last 3 month ; Zithromax® Azadose® within last 3 month ; Medication study ( except : paracetamol , contraceptive
